data.title: Trevor Jones South African Hollywood Music King.
data.meta_description: Trevor Jones South African born Film Music Composer . I am of the very opinionated opinion that Iron Man inspirer, Elon Musk,  Bloemfontein born J R R Tolkien, writer of The Lord Of The Rings, and top Hollywood composer Trevor Jones are currently three of our top South African Born Heroes and are greatly influencing the world on […]
data.text:
LABYRINTH

Tandem / Scott Free Productions

Director: Christopher Smith

Starring John Hurt, Tom Felton, Katie McGrath, Vanessa Kirby, Jessica Findlay-Brown

SOUNDTRACK available on itunes

A historical miniseries based on the 2005 novel of the same name by Kate Mosse. The series jumps between modern and medieval France and follows two women’s search for the holy grail.

Click here for more information on IMDB

THE LAST OF THE MOHICANS

20th Century Fox

Director / Producer: Michael Mann

Starring Daniel Day-Lewis, Madeleine Stowe

*MUSIC NOMINATED for BEST FILM SCORE GOLDEN GLOBE AWARDS 1993

*MUSIC NOMINATED for BEST FILM SCORE BAFTA AWARDS 1993

SOUNDTRACK on Morgan Creek Records 2959 20015 2

SOUNDTRACK has exceeded 1,000,000 sales and has gone PLATINUM

British and French troops are at war in colonial America, with aid from various native American war parties. A romance begins between a British officer’s daughter and an independent man who was reared as a Mohawk…

Click here for more information on IMDB

NOTTING HILL

Working Title / Polygram

Director: Roger Michell

Producer: Duncan Kenworthy

Starring Julia Roberts, Hugh Grant, Rhys Ifans

SOUNDTRACK on Island Records 546 207-2

*PLATINUM ALBUM

** WINNER of the BRIT AWARDS BEST SOUNDTRACK 1999

‘Can the most famous film star in the world fall for just an ordinary guy?’

Anna Scott, the most famous woman in the world, enters William Thacker’s Notting Hill bookshop and changes his life for ever. They fall in love. However, being with the world’s most wanted woman is not easy and the course of true love rarely runs smoothly…

Click here for more information on IMDB

THE DARK CRYSTAL

A Jim Henson Film

Directors: Jim Henson, Frank Oz

Producers: Jim Henson, Gary Kurtz

*WINNER of the BEST FILM AWARD at the L’ABOREAS FANTASY FILM FESTIVAL 1983

SOUNDTRACK on Warner Bros. 7599-23749-1

The time of the great conjunction of the three suns is near. The control of the evil Skekses will last forever if the crystal is not healed. Step forward the last of the Gelflings, Jen, to find the missing shard of the crystal. Can he heal the crystal and restore order to the planet? Fantasy animated film.

Click here for more information on IMDB

IN THE NAME OF THE FATHER

Universal Pictures

Director: Jim Sheridan

Producer: Arthur Lappin

Starring Daniel Day -Lewis, Emma Thompson.

*WINNER of the GOLDEN BEAR AWARD at the BERLIN FILM FESTIVAL

*NOMINATED for 3 GOLDEN GLOBE AWARDS

*NOMINATED for 7 ACADEMY AWARDS

*NOMINATED for 2 BAFTA AWARDS

SOUNDTRACK on Island Records 8026 518 841-2

‘Falsely accused. Wrongly imprisoned. He fought for justice to clear his father’s name.’

Based on the true story of Gerry Conlon, a Belfast youth who was wrongly convicted of bombing two pubs outside of London. A story about the relationship between a father and his son who fought for justice to clear his father’s name.

Click here for more information on IMDB

CLIFFHANGER

Carolco Pictures

Director: Renny Harlin

Producer: Alan Marshall

Starring Sylvester Stallone, John Lithgow, Michael Rooker

*NOMINATED for 3 ACADEMY AWARDS

SOUNDTRACK on Scotti Brothers 2392-75417-2

‘Hang on!’

Almost a year later after watching a friend fall to her death, Gabe is asked to go back to the same mountain range and rescue a group of ‘stranded’ people. These people are in fact looking for three boxes filled with $100,000,000 and they need a local expert to lead them to it…

Click here for more information on IMDB

MISSISSIPPI BURNING

The Mississippi Company for Orion Films

Director: Alan Parker

Producer: Robert Colesbury

Starring Gene Hackman,Willem Defoe, Frances McDormand

*MUSIC NOMINATED for the BEST FILM SCORE BAFTA 1990

*NOMINATED FOR 7 ACADEMY AWARDS

SOUNDTRACK on Antilles AN 8745

Two FBI agents from hugely different backgrounds are investigating the murder of civil rights workers during the ‘60’s. They seek to breach the conspiracy of silence in a small, racially segregated Southern town whilst learning to deal with each other’s wildly divergent outlooks.

Click here for more information on IMDB

SEA OF LOVE

Universal Pictures

Director: Hal Becker

Producer: Lou Stroller

SOUNDTRACK on Polygram Records 8421702

‘In search of a killer, he found someone who’s either the love of his life… or the end of it’

New York detective Frank Keller is unsettled, and has not come to terms with his wife leaving him for a collegue. He investigates a serial killer who finds victims through the lonely hearts columns, and finds he is falling in love with Helen, the main suspect in the case.

Click here for more information on IMDB

ANGEL HEART

An Alan Parker Film

Director: Alan Parker

Producer: Alan Marshall

Starring Mickey Rourke, Robert De Niro, Lisa Bonet, Charlotte Rampling

SOUNDTRACK on Antilles AN 8709

Harry Angel, a private investigator, is hired to find a man called Johnny Favorite. All the people he contacts are mysteriously killed. As the case develops, Harry is forced to deal with the devil himself…

Click here for more information on IMDB

AROUND THE WORLD IN 80 DAYS

Walden Media

Distributed by Walt Disney Pictures

Dir. Frank Coraci

Starring Jackie Chan, Steve Coogan, Cecile De France, Jim Broadbent

SOUNDTRACK on Disney B0002 94QYK

An eccentric inventor, Phileas Fogg, makes a bet to circumnavigate the globe in no more than 80 days. Fogg embarks on his trip with sidekicks Passpartout (Jackie Chan) and femme-fatale Monique (Cecile De France). Numerous cameos on the way include Arnold Schwarzenegger as a Turkish prince, Luke and Owen Wilson as the Wright Bros., and Cathy Bates as Queen Victoria…

Click here for more information on IMDB

THE LEAGUE OF EXTRAORDINARY GENTLEMEN

League Productions for 20th Century Fox

Director: Stephen Norrington

Starring Sean Connery, Naseeruddin Shah, Peta Wilson, Stuart Townsend

SOUNDTRACK on Varese Sarabande 302 066 492 2

Allan Quatermain (Connery) is recalled from retirement in Kenya to lead a group of 19th Century ‘Superheroes’ to fight the worldwide threat of the evil ‘Fantom’. The League Of Extraordinary Gentlemen comprises seafarer/inventor Captain Nemo, vampiress Mina Harker , invisible man Rodney Skinner, the ageless Dorian Gray, Dr Jekyll/ Mr Hyde and American Secret Service agent Tom Sawyer…

Click here for more information on IMDB

THIRTEEN DAYS

New Line and Beacon

Director: Roger Donaldson

Producer: Armyan Bernstein

Starring Kevin Costner, Bruce Greenwood

SOUNDTRACK on New Line Records NLR-90052

MUSIC NOMINATED for IVOR NOVELLO AWARDS

Set during the Cuban missile crisis in October 1962. An exploration into how President John F. Kennedy, Attorney General Robert Kennedy, and others handled a potentially explosive situation…

Click here for more information on IMDB

ARACHNOPHOBIA

Amblin Films for Hollywood Pictures

Director: Frank Marshall

Producers: Dick Vane and Kathleen Kennedy

Starring Jeff Daniels, John Goodman, Julian Sands

*MUSIC NOMINATED for the IVOR NOVELLO AWARD for BEST FILM THEME 1990

SOUNDTRACK on Hollywood Records 570 001 1

‘Eight legs, two fangs and an attitude.’

A black widow spider from the jungles of South America is accidentally transported to America where it mates with a local spider. The local residents soon start to disappear…

Click here for more information on IMDB

DESPERATE MEASURES

Sony Tri-Star

Director: Barbet Schroeder

Producer: Schroeder / Hoffman / Lee Rich

Starring Michael Keaton, Andy Garcia, Brian Cox, Marcia Gay Harden

SOUNDTRACK on Velvel Records 63467-79715-2

‘His son needs a DNA donor to live. The clock is ticking. The only match is a vicious killer. Now all Frank Conner has to do is catch him.’

He must find a way to stop them…

Click here for more information on IMDB

FROM HELL

20th Century Fox

Directors: Allen and Albert Hughes

Starring Johnny Depp, Heather Graham, Ian Holm, Robbie Coltrane.

SOUNDTRACK on Varese Sarabande

‘Only the legend will survive’

A portrayal of the infamous ‘Jack the Ripper’ who terrorized London’s East-End in the late 1880’s. The murders grab the attention of Inspector Frederick Abberline, a brilliant yet troubled man whose police work is often aided by his psychic abilities. Abberline becomes deeply involved with the case. It takes on personal meaning to him when he begins to fall in love with Mary Kelly, one of the prostitutes being hunted down by the Ripper. Will Abberline solve the case before Kelly becomes his next victim?

Click here for more information on IMDB

EXCALIBUR

Crystal Films Ltd.

Director / Producer: John Boorman

Starring Nigel Terry, Helen Mirren, Nicholas Clay, Cherie Lunghi, Nicol Williamson, Gabriel Byrne, Liam Neeson, Patrick Stewart

*WINNER of the ARTISTIC ACHIEVEMENT AWARD CANNES 1981

A re-telling of the tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.

Click here for more information on IMDB

DARK CITY

New Line

Director: Alex Proyas

Producer: Andrew Mason

Starring Rufus Sewell, William Hurt, Kiefer Sutherland, Jennifer Connelly

SOUNDTRACK on TVT Records 0 16581 81602 2

‘They built the city to see what makes us tick. Last night one of us went off.’

A man awakens alone In a strange hotel to find that he has lost his memory and is wanted for a series of brutal and bizarre murders. A woman who claims to be his wife is also after him. While trying to piece together his past, he stumbles upon a fiendish underworld controlled by a group of beings known as The Strangers who possess the ability to put people to sleep and alter the city and its inhabitants. He must find a way to stop them…

Click here for more information on IMDB

G.I JANE

Poleteam Ltd.

Director: Ridley Scott

Producers: Roger Birmbaum, Demi Moore, Suzanne Todd

Starring Demi Moore, Viggo Mortensen, Anne Bancroft

Distributors: Disney

SOUNDTRACK on Hollywood Records HR-62109-2

‘Failure is not an option’

A female Senator succeeds in enrolling a woman into Navy SEALS training. Everyone expects her to fail…

Click here for more information on IMDB

FREEJACK

Morgan Creek Productions

Director: Geoffrey Murphy

Producer: Stuart Oken

Starring Emilio Estevez, Mick Jagger, Rene Russo, Anthony Hopkins

SOUNDTRACK on Morgan Creek Records 2959-20008-2

‘Alex Furlong died today. Eighteen years from now, he’ll be running for his life.’

An auto racer is snatched by time travel, a split second before a fatal explosion, by a team who plan to sell his healthy body to an ailing rich man at McCandless Corporation, for a mind transfer. He escapes, but has no rights in his new life. He finds his fiancée Julie, now 18 years older and tries to revive the relationship.

Click here for more information on IMDB

KISS OF DEATH

20th Century Fox

Director: Barbet Schroeder

Starring David Caruso, Nicholas Cage, Helen Hunt, Samuel L. Jackson

SOUNDTRACK on Milan Records 73138 35715-2

Jimmy is an ex-con who’s trying to go straight, but can’t say no to one last job. When things go wrong, Jimmy is left to do the time, and his whole life is turned upside-down. When he gets out again, Jimmy goes undercover with the help of an angry detective to catch a psychotic mobster…

Click here for more information on IMDB

LABYRINTH

Henson Associates and Lucasfilms

Director: Jim Henson

Producer: Eric Ratray

Starring David Bowie, Jennifer Connelly

Executive Producer: George Lucas

SOUNDTRACK on EMI America

‘Where everything is possible and nothing is what it seems…’

A girl must solve a giant labyrinth before midnight to rescue her baby brother from the Goblin King.

Click here for more information on IMDB

BAD INFLUENCE

Epic Films

Director: Curtis Hanson

Producer: Steve Tisch

Starring Rob Lowe, James Spader

SOUNDTRACK on Island Records CD 9860

Michael is saved from a bar-fight from a mysterious drifter called Alex. But Alex is a dangerous sociopath, and Michael finds his life turned upside down…

Click here for more information on IMDB

HIDEAWAY

Tri-Star Columbia

Director: Brett Leonard

Starring Jeff Goldblum, Christine Lahti, Alicia Silverstone, Alfred Molina

SOUNDTRACK on TVT 016581 561 021

‘Hatch Harrison was pronounced dead on arrival. After two hours, the doctors brought him back. But he didn’t come back alone.’

Click here for more information on IMDB

CROSSROADS

Distribution: Paramount

Filmco Entertainment Inc.

Producer: Ann Carli

Director: Tamara Davis

Starring Britney Spears, Anson Mount, Zoe Saldana, Taryn Manning, Dan Aykroyd, Kim Cattrall.

Three childhood best friends, and a guy they just met, set off on a trip to LA, finding themselves and their friendship in the process.

Click here for more information on IMDB

RUNAWAY TRAIN

Cannon Films

Director: Andre Konchalowsky

Producer: Robert A Goldstone

Starring John Voight, Eric Roberts, Rebeccca De Mornay

*NOMINATED for 3 ACADEMY AWARDS 1986 SOUNDTRACK on Capitol Milan Records CD CH067

Two escaped convicts and a female railway worker are trapped on a train. There are no brakes and there is nobody driving…

Click here for more information on IMDB

BLAME IT ON THE BELLBOY

Bellboy Films Ltd. for Hollywood Pictures

Director: Mark Herman

Producers: Steve Abbott and Jenny Howarth

Starring Dudley Moore, Bryan Brown, Richard Griffiths

Three men from very different walks of life converge on the Hotel Gabriella in Venice. Linguistic mix-ups by the staff mean each of the trio get wrong instructions for the next day….

Click here for more information on IMDB

DOMINICK AND EUGENE aka NICKY AND GINO

Orion Pictures

Director: Bob Young

Producers: Marvin Minoff / Mike Farrell

Starring Ray Liotta, Tom Hulce, Jamie Lee Curtis

SOUNDTRACK on Varese Saraband 704.540

Dominick and Eugene are twins, but Dominick is a little bit slow due to an accident in his youth. They live together, with Dominick working as garbage man to put Eugene through medical school. Eugene must decide between his devotion to his brother, or his need to go away to complete his training.

Click here for more information on IMDB

CRISSCROSS

MGM / PATHE

Director: Chris Menges

Producers: Anthea Sylbert and Goldie Hawn

Starring Goldie Hawn, Arliss Howard, Steve Buscemi

SOUNDTRACK on Intrada Records MAF 7021D

Set in 1969, a twelve-year-old boy discovers that a restaurant owner is using a fishing boat to smuggle drugs in to shore. He steals some and sets about selling it so that his mother can quit her job as a stripper…

Click here for more information on IMDB

THE MIGHTY

Miramax

Director: Peter Chelsom

Producer: Simon Fields

Starring Harry Dean Stanton, Gena Rowlands, Sharon Stone, Kieran Culkin

SOUNDTRACK on ARC – 21 Records

*SONG NOMINATED for GOLDEN GLOBE AWARD 1998 – Best Original Song for a Film

‘The quest for friendship is the noblest cause of all.’

A story of 2 boys. Max is overweight, and suffers from a learning disability whilst Kevin has a rare disease that stops him leading a normal life. Kevin lives next door to Max and one day is assigned as a reading tutor to him. Together they travel to the land of knights and heroes in their books.

Click here for more information on IMDB

RICHARD III

Richard III Films Ltd Distributed by MGM/UA

Director: Richard Loncraine

Starring Ian McKellen, Annette Bening, Jim Broadbent, Robert Downey Jr., Kristin Scott Thomas

Winner of the Silver Bear Berlin Film Fesitval 1996

Winner of the Best Film Evening Standard Awards 1996

Nominated for Best Actor (Iain McKellan) Golden Globe Awards 1996

SOUNDTRACK on London Records 8287192

‘What Is Worth Dying For… Is Worth Killing For’

A classic Shakespearean play about a murderous, scheming king staged in an alternative, fascist England…
